definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui

sentences.english: In the northern and southern dynasties, appear miscellaneous cast.
The forth chapter discusses the development and transformation of the imitating ancient poetry in Wei, Jin and Northern & Southern dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 第四章论述魏晋南北朝拟“古诗”的发展流变。

sentences.english: The third part focused on discussing the Northern and Southern Buddhism's influence on the essay.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分主要讨论南北朝时期佛教对论说文的影响。

sentences.english: The system of village started in the Wei, Jin, and Southern and Northern dynasties was a great progress of local primary-level organizations.
sentences.chinese: 魏晋南北朝时代村的出现是地方基层组织的一大变革。

sentences.english: Weijin and Northern and Southern Dynasties is the prosperous period of the patriarchal clan in the Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 魏晋南北朝时期是中国历史上宗族强盛的时期。

sentences.english: Yuefu folksongs in the South and North Dynasties are of special charm in the history of ancient Chinese folksongs.
sentences.chinese: 南北朝乐府歌辞在中国古代民歌史上具有独特的魅力。

sentences.english: XIAO-Yan is the first emperor of the Liang Dynasty in Wei and Jin era.
sentences.chinese: 梁武帝萧衍是魏晋南北朝时期梁朝的开国帝王。

sentences.english: The south and north dynasties was a great abruption period.
sentences.chinese: 南北朝是中国历史上大分裂时期，战争连绵不绝。

sentences.english: The fourth part probes into the period of the Northern and Southern Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分探讨南北朝时期抒情小赋题材的新变。

sentences.english: Lady Xian lived during the Northern and Southern Dynasties, the most chaotic period in the history of ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 冼夫人糊口在中国汗青上最为杂乱的南北朝时期。

sentences.english: The music-dance art embodied this aesthetic ideal completely during Wei, Jin and Northern & Southern Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 魏晋南北朝乐舞艺术也充分体现了这一审美理想。

sentences.english: This period is a historical period when the family of power and influence and the landlords dominated.
sentences.chinese: 魏晋南北朝是门阀地主占主导地位的历史时期。

sentences.english: There are many variant characters on the Stone Inscriptions of Weijin South and North Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 魏晋南北朝石刻文献材料中存在大量异体字。

sentences.english: XIAO-Yan is the first emperor of the hang Dynasty in Wei and Jin era.
sentences.chinese: 梁武帝萧衍是魏晋南北朝时期梁朝的开国帝王。

sentences.english: Weiqi originated in China and it was introduced into Japan in Chinese Southern and Northern Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 围棋产生于中国，大约在南北朝时传入日本。

sentences.english: Folk songs of the Northern and Southern dynasties had great influence on poets of the Tang Dynasty (618-907 AD).
sentences.chinese: 南北朝民歌对后来唐朝的诗人有很大的影响。

definition: Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
Wei of the Northern Dynasties (386-534), founded by the Tuoba 拓跋 branch of Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
Five Dynasties (907-960) and Ten Kingdoms (902-979), period of political turmoil in ancient China
Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479), with capital at Nanjing
Sixteen Kingdoms of Five non-Han people (ruling most of China 304-439)/also written 五胡十六國|五胡十六国
Song of the Southern dynasties (420-479), with capital at Nanjing/also known as Liu Song 劉宋|刘宋
